caption.p: Modes of action of P. huayllabambana n-hexane fraction on S. enterica cell membrane. ( a) Action on cell membrane integrity. Absorbance measurement of intracellular components (DNA, RNA) at OD260 nm after 1 h of incubation. ( b) Action on membrane permeability. All data are expressed as mean Â± SD ( p < 0.05). Meth: methicillin. MIC: minimum inhibitory concentration.
